data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Britz, Ralf, Ali, Anvar (2015): Dario huli, a new species of badid from Karnataka, southern India (Teleostei: Percomorpha: Badidae). Zootaxa 3911 (1): 139-144, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3911.1.9
